title: Smooth Multiplayer Inventory
description: Smooth Multiplayer Inventory is a versatile inventory system for UE5. It includes an icon generator, customizable shortcut keys, drag-and-drop functionality, and support for equipable weapons and cosmetic items, making it perfect for multiplayer projects.
longDescription:
How to Set Up

Overview Video

Demo Build

Support Discord


Smooth Multiplayer Inventory is a robust inventory system designed for Unreal Engine 5 that enhances item management in your game. Tailored for multiplayer experiences, this system combines usability with unique features to provide a comprehensive inventory solution.

Key Features:

  • Icon Generator: Easily create and customize item icons, improving visual appeal and making item identification straightforward.
  • Customizable Shortcut Keys: Streamline your inventory management with user-defined shortcut keys for quick actions like transferring or removing items.
  • Seamless Drag-and-Drop Management: Move items in and out of your inventory effortlessly, providing a smooth user experience.
  • Right-Click Options: Manage items intuitively with right-click context menus for quick access to actions.
  • Support for Equipable Weapons: Weapons automatically attach to your character’s mesh, ensuring realistic handling and immersion.
  • Equipable Cosmetic Items: Customize your characters with various cosmetic items that adjust the skeletal mesh dynamically.
  • Consumable Support: Implement consumable items with easy interactions for a richer gameplay experience.
  • Actor Interaction: Interact with objects like chests to access their inventories seamlessly, enhancing immersion.
  • Stackable Items & Splitting: Manage item stacks with ease, including the ability to split items for flexible inventory management.
  • Enhanced Customization: Built entirely in Blueprint with clear comments, allowing for easy adaptation to meet your project needs.

With Smooth Multiplayer Inventory, you’re not just adding an inventory system; you’re equipping your game with a versatile solution designed to elevate player experiences. Whether you’re developing a competitive multiplayer title or an engaging single-player adventure, this system is the perfect fit for your development toolkit.
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints:

  • 48

Input:

  • Preconfigured for Keyboard, and Mouse
  • Uses Enhanced Input System

Network Replicated:

  • Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: No

Documentation:

  • Comprehensive documentation can be found within the product blueprints, detailing how everything works and it set up.
  • How to Set Up

Important/Additional Notes:

  • The system is designed for easy integration into existing projects and is suitable for both multiplayer and single-player games.
